steps.plaintext: Find Aragaru (if Starry Night Chapter was completed first)
Talk to "Aragaru" / Talk to "the Aranara that suddenly appeared"
steps.markdown: Talk to "Aragaru" / Talk to "the Aranara that suddenly appeared"

steps.plaintext: Use the Kusava to open up the path
steps.markdown: Use the ◀Kusava▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Kusava▷ to open up the path

steps.plaintext: Investigate the runes surrounded by Fungi
steps.markdown: Investigate the runes surrounded by Fungi

substeps.plaintext: The runes are hidden behind plant-eroded stones, which can be destroyed by using the "Kusava."
substeps.markdown: The runes are hidden behind plant-eroded stones, which can be destroyed by using the ◀"Kusava."▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22Kusava%22▷

steps.plaintext: Enter the place where the Barsam Flower is located
steps.markdown: Enter the place where the Barsam Flower is located

steps.plaintext: Use the Kusava to break the seal on the  Barsam Flower (0/3)
steps.markdown: Use the Kusava to break the seal on the <img:barsam_flower> ◀Barsam Flower▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Barsam_Flower▷ (0/3)

substeps.plaintext: Follow the 3 Seelies and destroy the plant-eroded stones along the way. The third Seelie is behind the green barrier, which will be removed by the other 2 Seelies.
substeps.markdown: Follow the 3 ◀Seelies▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seelie▷ and destroy the plant-eroded stones along the way. The third Seelie is behind the green barrier, which will be removed by the other 2 Seelies.
